div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1087 Kuchuk-Mainak, suburb of Evpa- toriia (anc. Cercinitis), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1964 Burial: c. mid 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 62 AE. Pot hoard Cherronesus: AE (as BMC 5 [13], 6 [7], 8 [33]; SNGCop. 8 [1]; Zograph, pl. 35, 16 [6], 23 [2], various magistrates) Disposition: Evpatoriia (Regional Mus.) Gilevich, NE 8 (1970), pp. 3-16, illus.
